title: Pizza Delivery
description:

The manager provided him with ğ‘› coordinates of houses (ğ‘¥ ğ‘–, ğ‘¦ ğ‘–) (ğ‘¥ ğ‘–, ğ‘¦ ğ‘–) where he needs to deliver the pizza. He will deliver the pizza in the following way:

Each move takes him exactly one second, and handing over the pizza to the customer takes 0 
 seconds. The manager wants the delivery to be as fast as possible. You need to find the minimum delivery time for all GR pizzas. It is guaranteed that delivery is always possible.

Consider the second test case:
